title: DJ Sona Fanart

embed.description: DJ Sona is my favorite League of Legends skin, so I thought it would be fun to draw it. This picture was made as an exercise in anatomy and painting. Hope you enjoy!

body:
Here is a piece of DJ Sona fan art I made! This is my personal favorite skin in the game, I hope you enjoy the artwork. 
{{champion:37}}

replies.body:
Very cool - I particularly like the pose you put her left hand in.  It almost reminds me of the highly stylized and symbolic hand poses that some Medieval illustrations (and ancient Greek oratory hand signs).  

This one, for example, looks closest to the one that would have meant "Wait a moment" or "I'm about to say something" in ancient Greece.  Particularly amusing for Sona :)

Thank you very much! <3
I'm very glad to see you saw such an interesting meaning in the way I posed her hand. That's pretty cool!





...Senpai Rito noticed meee <3
